sentences.en: A convent is a contradiction. Its object , salvation; its means thereto, sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 修院是一种矛盾, 其目的是为了幸福, 其方式是牺牲.

sentences.en: Be absent in the middle of, informal thereto is crooked.
sentences.cn: 不在正中, 随便往那边歪.

sentences.en: Contract, in law, is an agreement creates an obligation binding upon the parties thereto.
sentences.cn: 从法律讲, 合同是一种对签约各方都具有约束力的协议.

sentences.en: He gave me a book and added thereto a fountain pen.
sentences.cn: 他给我一本书,此外又给我一只自来水笔.

sentences.en: In concluding a contract , the parties thereto shall implement the principle of good faith.
sentences.cn: 当事人订立合同, 应执行诚实信用原则.

sentences.en: Or that We created the angels female, and they are witnesses ( thereto )?
sentences.cn: 还是我曾将众天神造成女性的, 他们曾 眼见 我的创造 呢 ?

sentences.en: Such accession shall apply to this Agreement and the Multilateral Trade Agreement annexed thereto.
sentences.cn: 这种市场进入必须适用于本协议和本文所附的《多边贸易协议》.

sentences.en: Such accession shall apply to this Agreement and the Multilateral Trade Agreements thereto.
sentences.cn: 此加入适用于本协定及所附多边贸易协定.

sentences.en: The castle stands on a hill, and the road thereto is steep and rough.
sentences.cn: 城堡建在山上, 去那儿的路陡峭崎岖.

sentences.en: The Client agrees to indemnify MHC in respect of any claim arising in respect thereto.
sentences.cn: 在这些方面客户必须同意赔偿可能的损失.

sentences.en: The lease entitles the holder to use the buildings and any land attached thereto.
sentences.cn: 本租约持有人有权使用此建筑物以及所附属的土地。

sentences.en: The parties thereto shall, in good faith, comply with the decision and award of arbitration tribunal.
sentences.cn: 双方须以良好的诚信态度遵守仲裁庭的决定.

sentences.en: The relevant inspecting organs shall give assistance thereto.
sentences.cn: 有关检查机关应当予以协助.

sentences.en: Then, the thin - film sheet with the pressing tool bonded thereto is attached to a probe card.
sentences.cn: 然后, 将其上接合有按压工具的薄膜片附着到探针卡.

sentences.en: They signed the agreement and the documents appended thereto.
sentences.cn: 他们签署了协议与附件.
